title: Lt. Col. Alexander Vindman: "Here, Right Matters"
description: Michael's conversation with US Army Lt. Col. Alexander Vindman (Ret.), who also served on the National Security Council, on his book "Here, Right Matters: An American Story." He is the one who decided to report a phone call that eventually led to the impeachment of President Donald Trump. Original air date 17 September 2021. The book was published on 3 August 2021.
author: podcasts@siriusxm.com (Alexander Vindman, Michael Smerconish)
